articles.title: Josh Donaldson delivers for New York Yankees with grand slam walk-off in 10th inning
articles.description: With the Yankees down 7-4 in the bottom of the 10th inning, Josh Donaldson delivered a grand slam that lifted New York to an unexpected and much-needed win.
articles.content:
Josh Donaldson knew the ball left the ballpark the second it left his bat.
